column1: Can you believe it?! Itakura's long ball from a free-kick in his own half is met by Asano
column2: who takes a perfect first touch and sprints into the box. He then unleashes a shot from a difficult angle
column3: which beats Neuer and finds the back of the net! What a turnaround
column5: and what a goal to put Japan 2-1 up!!! GOOOOOOAAAAALLLL!!!!
